modName: GMAN - Give Me Achievements NOW and Items for A Successful Start
summary:
Are you lazy to unlock achievements? Are you lazy for crafting Daedric Armor? Are you lazy to get tons of gold?
You came to the right place! GMAN is for you!
descriptionHtml:
Are you lazy to unlock achievements? Are you lazy for crafting Daedric Armor? Are you lazy to get tons of gold?
You came to the right place! GMAN is for you!

What this mod does:

No Player Changes Version: DAEDRIC ARMOR SET, 1 MILLION SEPTIMS, 5000 LOCKPICKS and things I forgot lol xD

Player Changes Version: 9000000 CARRY WEIGHT, ALL PERKS, ALL SPELLS & SHOUTS, DAEDRIC ARMOR SET, 1 MILLION SEPTIMS, 5000 LOCKPICKS
and things I forgot again lol xD

and You'll get some achievements that I forgot again lol xD

Player Changes version is recommended for who's starting the game newly (straight at Helgen)

NOTE: No Player Changes version is compatible with my mod "Increased Carry Weight" while the Player Changes version isn't since it adjusts the value of the carry weight

This isn't a script, this is a .TXT which can be easily loaded into the game, steps are in Installation text
author: DodyXR1555
